banner.text: Start embedding powerful business intelligence reporting inside your modern web apps today

metaData.description: The Product Line Sales report displays sales details organized by category and subcategory of products using cascading parameters in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
Company Sales report shows product sales against year in matrix format using SSRS Tablix report item in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
Mail merge shows to envelope the employee details using SSRS List report item in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows the sales order details using RDL basic table with currency formatting in price textbox fields in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows the sales territory and its total sales using drilldown with  SSRS matrix report in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows the customer details in SSRS table report item and details are highlighted based on conditional row formatting in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
The barcode demo shows the available 1D, 2D and QR barcode types rendered in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer through RDL Custom Report Item.
This demo shows customer support analysis with SSRS drill through to explore details in another report based on user click action in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This RDL template shows the ticket sales analysis details of movie tickets using SSRS data region report items like chart and table in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This RDL report template shows website visitor analysis details using SSRS column chart, pie chart, line chart and table data item in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows the patient analysis report of a health care using SSRS doughnut chart, line chart and basic table data regions in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This report shows personal expense analysis details using SSRS image, text box, line, rectangle, chart and table report items in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows the product and suppliers details using SSRS pyramid, bar, column charts and table widget in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
metaData.title: Northwind Products Report

metaData.description: This report template shows the sales order details based on order number using the RDL report parameters, rectangle, line and table in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows the sales invoice details and the usage of report viewer parameters, expressions, and calculated fields using SSRS Tablix report item in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demos allows you to view the product catalog RDLC that exist on the local file system with JSON array and custom business object data collection in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demos allows you to view the sales by year RDLC that exist on the local file system with JSON array and custom business object data collection in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows product sales total based on  quarterly wise RDL tablix grouping in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows the product details using the SSRS table report item with barcodes rendered in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer through RDL Custom Report Item.
This demo shows the sales order details using RDLC basic table with currency formatting in price textbox fields in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demos allows shows the consolidated balance sheet RDLC report represents the assets and liabilities of a company in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demos shows the Paystub report represents the payslip of a company in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demos allows you to choose the chart series dynamically in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo represents company sales against year in table format with data bar report item in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demo shows the company sales data with sparkline report item to represents the sales trend in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
This demos allows you to choose the column of the table dynamically in Javascript Bold Report Viewer.
The Product Line Sales report displays sales details organized by category and subcategory of products using external cascading parameter in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.

The Product Line Sales report displays sales details organized by category and subcategory of products using cascading parameters and date time picker non cascading parameters in JavaScript Bold Report Viewer.
